id.description: scene structure unique element ID in UUIDv4 format

x.description: X position in meters relative to parent element

y.description: Y position in meters relative to parent element

z.description: Z position in meters relative to parent element

ry.description: rotation around Y axis in arc degree

visible.description: defines visibility based on camera mode

bake.description: toggle to include node in baking

hideInBakedModel.description: toggle to include node in baking but hide geometry in output

bakeStatus.description: info on whether the node has been included in baked geometry

nodeId.description: External reference to scene structure node

fileUrl.description: Location of the ifc file that was imported
